settings.text:
Existing members: Enter your existing details and create a new password to activate your account.

ACTIVATE YOUR ACCOUNT

settings.title: Which size should I choose?
settings.accordion_content:
JETS Australia swimwear is true to size, though we do recommend checking our size guide.

If you’re still unsure, you can chat to one of our trained fit specialists - our teams will be happy to help you find the style and fit that works for you.

settings.title: How do I know if an item is in stock?
settings.accordion_content:
All items displayed are in stock, however you’ll need to check the colour and size that applies to you. If your size or colour is not showing, then unfortunately this item is out of stock.

If you need help finding similar style options, our Customer Care Team will be able to help you.

settings.title: Which countries do you ship to?
settings.accordion_content: Australia only, however you can shop internationally via one of our stockists.

settings.title: Can I shop online in NZD?
settings.accordion_content:
Absolutely. If you wish to change your currency, you can click the arrow in the top left and choose NZD from the drop-down menu.

Note: If you're a UK or US customer, this will take you to your local site so you can shop in your currency. For Canadian customers, you'll be able to change to your currency through the US website.

settings.title: Can I purchase a gift card online?
settings.accordion_content: Yes, you can purchase e-gift cards online. Please visit our gift cards page to select your amount and your personalised message.

settings.title: Can I redeem my gift card online?
settings.accordion_content:
Yes, you can redeem your gift card online. To redeem your gift card, enter your gift card number and PIN in the 'Order Summary' tab at checkout.

If you have any issues, please contact our Customer Care Team.

settings.title: Can I buy a bikini top and bottom separately, even though they are pictured together?
settings.accordion_content: Absolutely, all bikini tops and bottoms are shot and displayed together on the body; however all are sold as individual pieces so you can mix and match styles and sizes until you find your perfect set, don’t be afraid to mix & match. Please note all prices for each bikini piece are as marked on the individual items.

settings.title: I have seen an item on the website and now it no longer appears. Do items come back in stock?
settings.accordion_content: Yes, some products will come back in stock. Please check back on the site or contact our Customer Care Team to find out about product availability.

settings.title: Shop Online
Christmas Delivery
settings.accordion_content:
For delivery in time for Christmas, please place your order by the below dates:

Dec 13     Western Australia, Northern Territory

Dec 14     Victoria, Queensland, Tasmania, South Australia

Dec 15     New South Wales

settings.title: Which countries do you ship to?
settings.accordion_content:
We currently ship to the following countries: Australia, New Zealand, Canada, UK and US.

If you're not a AU or NZ customer, please use the links below to direct you to your local site.

* United Kingdom

* United States / Canada

settings.title: Does Jets Ship to Post Office boxes?
settings.accordion_content: Yes, Jets does ship to Australian PO boxes.

settings.title: Does Jets ship to multiple addresses?
settings.accordion_content:
Unfortunately, you may only ship to one address per order.

If your order contains gifts or items that require shipping to multiple locations, you will need to place separate orders for each address.

settings.title: How soon can I get my order and how much will it cost?
settings.accordion_content:
Our delivery timeframe is 1-3 business days for metropolitan areas and up to 14 days for regional areas (For for NZ orders, DHL Express is 2-4 business days)

Australia

All orders over AU$150: FREE shipping

Orders under AU$150: AU$10

New Zealand

All orders over AU$150: FREE shipping

Orders under NZ$150: AU$20

settings.title: My shipping address is incorrect on my order, how can I change this?
settings.accordion_content:
Once an order has been placed, no changes can be made.

We recommend contacting our Customer Care Team who will help you get in touch with the shipping carrier to organise a redirect for you.

settings.title: Delivery
Can I return or exchange my order?
settings.accordion_content:
We offer 30 day free returns and exchanges for all orders, provided you have:

• Proof of purchase (order number)

• Garment/s are in their original condition, with tags and hygiene stickers still attached.

In the interests of hygiene, we may refuse returns of items where it's obvious that this hasn't been done.

We are unable to accept returns or exchanges on our Final Sale items due to change of mind, unless deemed faulty. 

​Please note: $30 Sign Up discount code is applied proportionally across each item purchased and on returning the sign up code will be forfeited accordingly.

settings.title: How do I return or exchange my order?
settings.accordion_content:
All returns and exchanges can be completed using the portal links below in Step 3.

Submitting your return or exchange

Step 1: Go to My Account then click on the Returns tab to see your orders.

Step 2: If your order is within our 30 day policy, you'll be able to select the order you'd like to return or exchange.

Step 3: Once selected, you'll be directed to the Australia Post website. (Note: For all New Zealand orders, please use the DHL Returns Portal instead).

Step 4: Affix the printed return label provided by Australia Post to your parcel. and drop off at any Australia Post Office or Red Box. If you don’t have a printer, present the digital copy of your return label at your post office to have printed.

Note: Returns are processed within 3-5 business days of being received at our warehouse. Please keep your return reference number as this can be used to track your return via Australia Post.

settings.title: How do I return or exchange my International order?
settings.accordion_content: If your item was delivered to an International address (including New Zealand), please use the DHL Returns Portal and follow the steps within the Portal to complete your return.

settings.title: Can I return or exchange an item that I bought from a stockist?
settings.accordion_content: Please check the returns policy on the stockist’s website. We highly recommend that you contact the stockist’s customer service team to further assist you if you wish to return or exchange your purchase.

settings.title: Who pays for my return postage?
settings.accordion_content: Jets offers free returns. Please follow the steps in the 'How do I return or exchange my order' section.

settings.title: Where do I send the items I wish return?
settings.accordion_content:
Please direct all return or exchange packages to:


Jets Online Returns
c/Quantium Solutions
PO Box 5151
Minto NSW 2566
Australia

settings.title: When will I receive my refund payment?
settings.accordion_content:
Refunds will be processed to the original payment method within 5 business days of Jets receiving the return parcel. Notification will be sent to nominated email address at the time of this transaction.


Note: Jets cannot be held accountable for banking institution processing timeframes.

settings.title: Can I return an online order to a store?
settings.accordion_content: Jets doesn't currently have any physical stores.

settings.title: Returns
What is Refundid?
settings.accordion_content: Refundid is a third party platform that enables instant refunds. Log in or create an account with Refundid and lodge your return to receive an instant refund. Then simply download your return label and send back your items within 7 days.

settings.title: Where do I receive my refund?
settings.accordion_content: When signing up to Refundid you will be asked to provide a BSB and Account Number. Your refund will appear in this nominated bank account.

settings.title: Will I be charged to use Refundid?
settings.accordion_content: No, Refundid is free for all customers in Australia to use, with no additional cost. You will only be charged if your return is not received within 30 days.

settings.title: When do I need to return my items?
settings.accordion_content: You have 7 days to post your return after lodging your return through Refundid. If your return tracking has not updated within 7 days, Refundid will reverse the instant refund.

settings.title: I paid with Afterpay, do I keep making my payments?
settings.accordion_content: Yes! Since you haven’t paid for the items in full yet, you will need to keep up with your Afterpay instalments to avoid dishonour fees from Afterpay.​

settings.title: Is there a limit on returns through Refundid?
settings.accordion_content: Yes, Refundid is capped at $1,500 per order.

settings.title: Instant Refunds with Refundid
I'm an existing customer, why do I need to activate my account by creating a new password?​
settings.accordion_content:
We’ve launched an exciting new website so if you’re an existing customer, you’ll need to activate your account by creating a new password here​.

This means you’ll have access to your existing account, including your order history.

settings.title: How do I activate my account?
settings.accordion_content:
Once you filled out the form on our activation page, you’ll receive a confirmation email that your account has been successfully activated.

This means your activation is complete and you’ll have access to your account.

settings.title: I can't login to my account, why?
settings.accordion_content:
Is this your first time logging in to your account after 28th June 2022? If so, please enter your existing account details and create a new password here.

If you are still having difficulties, please contact our Customer Care team.

settings.title: Account Activation
Where can I find stockists of JETS?
settings.accordion_content: Find your nearest stockist by searching your location or postcode in our store locator.

settings.title: Can I return or exchange an item that I bought from a stockist?
settings.accordion_content:
Please check the returns policy on the stockist’s website.

We highly recommend that you contact the stockist’s customer service team to further assist you if you wish to return or exchange your purchase.

settings.title: Shop from Stockists
What payment methods does Jets accept?
settings.accordion_content: We accept Visa, MasterCard, Amex, Google Pay, Apple Pay, Paypal, AfterPay and Shop Pay. Read more on our payment options.

settings.title: Is it safe to use my credit card online at Jets?
settings.accordion_content:
At Jets, your personal online security is important to us. We use the latest SSL encryption technology to safely transmit your personal and credit card information.

All orders are processed through a secure checkout system provided by Shopify Payments.

Additionally, for your safety and protection, we do not store any cardholder account data. All credit card payment service are secure and are handled by Shopify Payments.

settings.title: Payment
What discount code will I receive?
settings.accordion_content: Everyone who joins the JETS Australia email list will receive a $30 off Sign Up Exclusive Discount Code. Applicable for full price styles only and is valid for 30 days.

settings.title: When will I receive my discount code?
settings.accordion_content: Your $30 off Sign Up Discount Code will be available to use 24 hours after registration and will automatically apply when you sign into your account. This is valid for 30 days after signup.

settings.title: It has been over 24 hours since I signed up. Where do I find my Sign Up Reward?
settings.accordion_content: Your $30 off Sign Up Discount Code will be available to use 24 hours after registration and will automatically apply when you sign into your account. This is valid for 30 days after signup.

settings.title: Is there a minimum spend on discount codes?
settings.accordion_content: No, there is no minimum spend on discount code, however it can only be used on full-price products and can not be used in conjunction with any promotions.

settings.title: My Discount Code has expired. Can I still use it?
settings.accordion_content: Unfortunately, you cannot use your discount code once it has expired.

settings.title: Can I use my reward with other promotions?
settings.accordion_content: No, rewards can not be used with other promotions unless stated otherwise on our Terms and Conditions page.

settings.title: Discount Codes
